channel.title: +मानसतरङ्गिणीकृल्-लेखाः on देवेषु विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +मानसतरङ्गिणीकृल्-लेखाः on देवेषु विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Limbya Shinde
item.description: Source: here. Limbya narrates: When I was a young I was seized by a by a bhoot. It was a huge ghost of the Khais variety that may assume the form of a Meccan demon or a Mohammedan. When I was sleeping one night near my sheep the Khais came and pulled my leg. I was afraid and said f**k you, who is pulling at me. I woke up but could not see anything.
